name: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
desc: Constants for the names of font attributes.

items.name: static let family: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An optional string object that specifies the font family.

items.name: static let name: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An optional string object that specifies the font name.

items.name: static let face: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An optional string object that specifies the font face.

items.name: static let size: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An optional floating-point number that specifies the font size.

items.name: static let visibleName: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An optional string object that specifies the font’s visible name.

items.name: static let matrix: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An affine transform that specifies the font’s transformation matrix.

items.name: static let variation: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: A dictionary that describes the font’s variation axis.

items.name: static let characterSet: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: The set of Unicode characters covered by the font.

items.name: static let cascadeList: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An array, each member of which is a sub-descriptor.

items.name: static let traits: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: A dictionary that fully describes the font traits.

items.name: static let fixedAdvance: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: A floating-point value that overrides the glyph advancement specified by the font.

items.name: static let featureSettings: NSFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: An array of dictionaries representing non-default font feature settings.
